page.text: st
Dr., Apt 1, Astoria, NY 11106 540-319-1772 trans13@mail.wlu.edu
Washington and Lee University – Williams School of Commerce, Economics and Politics - Lexington, VA
Bachelor of Arts in Economics; Minors in Finance and Journalism
GPA: 3.6/4.0 – SAT: Math 800, Verbal 600, Math II 740
Full 4-year International Student Scholarship
Coursework: Macroeconomics, Microeconomics, Econometrics, M&A, LBOs and Divestitures, Financial Statements
Analysis, Intermediate Accounting, International Trade, Reporting on the Economy
Brunswick Group – Financial Communications Intern – New York, NY
09/2013 – present
Currently interning with Brunswick Group, a leading Financial, M&A and Corporate Communications Consultancy
Supporting stakeholders communication, research and real-time media monitoring activities for clients
Preparing daily comprehensive media analysis of the Eurozone sovereign debt crisis for a multinational bank client
Fleishman-Hillard – Corporate Financial Communications Intern – New York, NY
Helped firm secure new business with Zurich Insurance Group by conducting comprehensive media audit and research
Analyzed Bank CEOs’ public relations activities and recommended strategies to increase Citi executives’ media visibility
Secured 1 ESPN radio podcast and 3 game reviews on football teams’ fan sites for EA Sports NCAA Football 14
Woori Investment & Securities – Equity Research Intern – Hanoi, Vietnam
Performed financial analysis on operating health of companies in VSI-20 (top 20 Vietnamese businesses with largest
market cap). Modeled future expected financials and forecasted price targets using fundamental analysis
Reconstructed existing DCF model which was selected to be used in future valuations by the Research Division
Developed method for using the CAMELS rating system to evaluate commercial banks’ performance
Ogilvy Public Relations Worldwide – Account Coordinator – Hanoi, Vietnam
Planned and facilitated promoting events of Ford Fiesta’s launch campaign in Vietnam, resulting in sales of 400+ new
Fiesta cars nationwide in first 3 months
Pitched Ford’s news to 20+ national media outlets, leading to 150% increase in positive media coverage in 2 months
Wrote speeches for Ford's Managing Director to deliver in news conferences and events
The Creative Kid Project – Co-founder – Hanoi, Vietnam
Solicited and managed a $2,000 budget funded by Brown University, Toyota and Vietnam Investment Gateway
Planned and executed publicity campaigns to establish The Project as Vietnam’s first non-profit kids leadership program
Secured media coverage for The Project on 2 broadcasting outlets and 5 national newspapers
Stanford’s Gumball Challenge Initiative – Co-founder – Lexington, VA
Started a lunch delivery service for Washington and Lee professors & staff and worked with team to generate $400 profit
in a week from an initial investment of $27
Annual Fund Phonathon: Cold-called alumni and solicited $20,000+ in donation for the W&L Annual Fund
W&L Dance Company; SWANK Crew: Choreographed and performed dance routines in various events on campus
International Student Association: Organized social activities for W&L international students community
Languages & Skills: Vietnamese (native), Mandarin (conversational), Factiva, Stata, Bloomberg Terminal
Interests: Aspiring entrepreneur, passionate hip-hop dancer, amateur Vietnamese-cuisine chef, avid video gamer
